name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024
description:
Step into the role of general manager of your favorite football franchise with Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024. The game world is fully customizable and gives you total control of your team. Make decisions on drafting the next star, trading players and signing free agents to build an all-time great dynasty. Want to go deeper? Create extensive custom gameday strategies, create your own plays and playbooks and you can even call the plays on the field with our reimagined game display.

If you are looking for the utmost in realism in a career franchise mode football game then Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024 is the game for you!
